title: Chapter 4548 - Chapter 4548: 4547 Annihilating The Evil Sequence Camp 13
body:
Chapter 4548 - Chapter 4548: 4547 Annihilating The Evil Sequence Camp 13

Chapter 4548: 4547 annihilating the evil sequence camp 13

Wang Xian, the axe sword demon, and the Lord of disaster were all hardened steel.

He would deal with the opponent’s strong vitality.

However, if he were to fight thousand tentacles with hardened steel, thousand tentacles would not be his opponent at all.

They were not even on the same level.

The injuries on Wang Xian’s body were healing rapidly.

The vitality in thousand tentacles’body was disappearing rapidly.

Thousand tentacles sensed his condition and his expression changed drastically.

“My life force is disappearing rapidly. I’m not a match for this Dragon King. Support Me!”

Thousand tentacles shouted in horror!

At the side, the Lord of Calamity and Axe Sword Demon were suppressing the other two bodies of Wang Xian.

Hearing Thousand Tentacles’cry for help, their expressions changed drastically.

They looked at thousand tentacles and sensed his condition. Then, they looked at Wang Xian in front of them unwillingly.

“Thousand tentacles, hide behind us!”

The Lord of calamity immediately flew toward thousand tentacles and shouted at him!

Boom! Boom! Boom

Boom! Boom! Boom

However, the moment they flew over, Wang Xian’s two bodies also moved.

One by one, they covered the sky and flew toward the Lord of Calamity and the others to stop them.

Under the same level of strength, it was still very easy for Wang Xian to stop them.

Even if the other party was exchanging injuries for injuries, he could still stop them for more than ten seconds.

And these ten seconds were enough!

Boom! Boom! Boom

Boom! Boom

Wang Xian quickly attacked the thousand tentacles again.

His unparalleled speed made it impossible for the thousand tentacles to dodge.

“Ah, Dragon King, if you want to kill me, you will have to pay a terrible price too!”

When thousand tentacles saw Wang Xian rushing over, his entire head started to turn blood red. Countless tentacles went up to meet him.

Boom! Boom! Boom! Boom

Boom! Boom! Boom

Wang Xian continued to bombard him. Sensing the position of his weakness, he threw a punch.

“Huh?”

When thousand tentacles saw that his weakness was being attacked, his mind moved and he immediately shifted his weakness.

“PFFT! PFFT! PFFT!”

Puff! Puff! Puff

However, just as he was dodging, a large number of tentacles were crushed by Wang Xian and turned into flesh and blood. Wang Xian kept them away.

“Save me!”

A part of thousand tentacles’body was crushed again. Feeling that his strength was reduced again, he felt suffocated.

“I can’t hold on anymore!”

Thousand tentacles shouted loudly at the Lord of Calamity, axe sword demon.

“Eight seconds!”

The Lord of Disaster responded loudly. He didn’t attack Wang Xian’s other body, causing his body to bleed continuously.

Cracks started to appear!

However, he couldn’t achieve a breakthrough in an instant!

Boom! Boom! Boom

Boom! Boom! Boom

Wang Xian’s figure changed as his body continued to attack thousand tentacles.

Eight seconds was enough for Wang Xian to kill thousand tentacles!

Wang Xian was engaged in close combat with thousand tentacles, and fresh blood splattered everywhere.

Relying on his speed, he was able to exchange thousand tentacles for a great deal of damage at the smallest cost.

One by one, the tentacles were cut off and turned into flesh and blood before Wang Xian kept them.

Under the continuous attacks, thousand tentacles, who was already severely injured, had a weaker and weaker life force!

However, under his full-strength defense, he had indeed caused quite a lot of trouble for Wang Xian. The injuries on his body were not weak either!

“Great Escape Art!”

When thousand contacts was severely injured one after another and his vitality and strength were decreasing, he let out a loud roar.

His entire body suddenly turned illusory.

His illusory body was burning continuously.

“Huh?”

When Wang Xian saw this scene, he raised his eyebrows slightly.

He was burning his life and placed himself in a special domain space.

This domain space was similar to the one that Wang Xian was currently in.

It wouldn’t be so easy to break it.

Wang Xian divined the situation of the thousand tentacles and smiled faintly.

The price he had to pay for using this great escape art was too high!

His body moved and the other two bodies disappeared immediately. The three bodies merged into one.

Feeling the injuries on his body, Wang Xian was quickly recovering.

“Hahaha, Dragon King, it won’t be that easy to kill me!”

At the front, thousand tentacles, who had managed to dodge the attack, immediately stopped using the escape art. He spoke in an extremely miserable manner!

“Stupid!”

Wang Xian shook his head. The figure of thousand tentacles appeared in front of him and grabbed with his palm.

“PFFT!”

In an instant, thousand tentacles’body collapsed and dissipated!

Thousand Tentacles, whose strength had been reduced to the level of the Great Dao, was unable to withstand his curse.

Furthermore, the Lord of calamity and the axe sword demon didn’t have the time to help him withstand it.

That was because Wang Xian could kill him instantly!

Thousand Tentacles’life force had completely dissipated. His aura was completely gone.

His body fell to the ground.

“Phew!”

Wang Xian exhaled. He looked at the axe sword demon and the Lord of calamity with a smile on his face.

“With one thousand tentacles dead, it’s Your Turn Now!”

He spoke with a smile on his face!

When the Lord of Calamity and the rest saw Wang Xian’s smile, their hearts turned cold!

Their eyes swept across the corpse of thousand tentacles. Their hearts pounded violently and they were a little frightened.

“You… you set your target on thousand tentacles from the very beginning. Are you planning to kill him from the very beginning?”

Axe sword demon growled in a low voice!

“Yes, I can only kill all of you by killing him first!”

Wang Xian nodded and replied with a smile.

Upon hearing Wang Xian’s words, the Lord of calamity and Axe Sword Demon’s hearts sank.

They had been fighting the Dragon King for millions of years.

During these millions of years, the Dragon King had figured them out, and they had also figured out the Dragon King.

With the Dragon King’s strength, he was able to fight against them for a million years while they were working together and using all of their trump cards.

Now that thousand tentacles was dead, they lacked an important fighting force, and they were no longer a match for the Dragon King.

“Send a message to thousand tentacles immediately and tell him to come over. Only with the three of us working together can we fight against the Dragon King!”

“Let’s stall the Dragon King first. With our life force, we should be able to last for a few million years or even more. There shouldn’t be any problems!”

The Lord of disaster transmitted his voice to sword demon axe!

“Alright!”

Sword demon axe nodded and immediately replied.

“Boom!”

However, at this moment, they saw the Dragon King directly attack the barrier of this space.

The intense attack caused the barrier of this space to tremble again, and a crack appeared.

After a dozen more attacks, this special space formed by the Lord of Calamity was about to collapse!

“Stop him. Without this space to defend, we are no match for him!”

The Lord of Calamity’s expression changed again as he shouted loudly!

Boom! Boom

They immediately launched their attacks and attacked Wang Xian.

Wang Xian’s figure flashed as he dodged the important attacks and continued to attack the barrier.

Facing the Lord of Calamity and the others, coupled with the thousand-tentacle attacks, Wang Xian might have to defend with all his might.

However, there was no need for the Lord of calamity and the axe sword demon to do so!

He could totally defend while attacking this space.

“Damn it, we can’t Stop It!”

The attacks on Wang Xian were blocked more than a dozen times.

The Lord of calamity and the rest understood that they couldn’t stop it with just the two of them.

The space that restricted the Dragon King started to dissipate!
